    void
    play()
    contains core mechanics for gameplay 1) Player order sets 2) flip's the winner's dice 3) check if the player crossed 100 4) advance player position 5) check if the player is on a snake or ladder 6) check if the player is on the same position as the opponent 7) check if the player has won (got to tile 100 exactly) 8) Repeats steps 2-7 for the opponent's turn

    • LadderAndSnake

      public LadderAndSnake(int playerCount, String[][] board)
      parameterized constructor to initialize playercount and gameplay board
      Parameters:
      playerCount - initializes the amount of players in the game
      board - sets the 10 by 10 snakes and ladders board

  • Method Details

      Parameters:

    • backtrack

      public void backtrack(Player player)
      Parameters:
      player - retrieves player object to get their current position in case they step over 100

    • flipDice

      public int flipDice()
      Rolls the dice between 1 and 6 inclusively for gameplay
      Returns:
      int representing dice roll

    • playerOrder

      public void playerOrder(Player player1, Player player2)
      Parameters:
      player1 - player2 determine order of plays by rolling each player's dice

    • promptEnterKey

      public void promptEnterKey()
      Controls flow of while loop to allow user to press enter to continue game

    • play

      public void play()
      contains core mechanics for gameplay 1) Player order sets 2) flip's the winner's dice 3) check if the player crossed 100 4) advance player position 5) check if the player is on a snake or ladder 6) check if the player is on the same position as the opponent 7) check if the player has won (got to tile 100 exactly) 8) Repeats steps 2-7 for the opponent's turn
